data.name: Dagon - The Little Glass Bottle DLC
data.detailed_description:
--------------------------------------------------------------
Wishlist now to get notified about the release!
--------------------------------------------------------------

*----------------------------------------------------------*
!!! All profits will be donated to help the victims of war in Ukraine !!!
^ click for more information
*----------------------------------------------------------*

I am John Jones who writes this letter my ship is fast sinking with a treasure on board I am where it is marked * on the enclosed chart



Join Captain William Jones and his party of men on a treasure hunt adventure! The Little Glass Bottle is the second official DLC for Dagon, based on the first surviving story by the master of weird fiction, written when he was… 7 years old! Take some rest from cosmic horror and eldritch underwater beings and experience the other, more humorous, side of young H. P. Lovecraft!

Features:

  • get a glimpse into Lovecraft’s mind at 7 years old
  • embark on an adventure during your coffee break (the game can be completed in less than 10 minutes)
  • learn interesting facts about the author’s own childhood
  • experience Lovecraft’s short story through a fully-voiced 3D game

  • Processor: Core i5-2400 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
